title: The Annoying Rock Stuck in your Shoe

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a target and evilly sneak into their shoe. If you haven't faked your death already, you'll appear dead the following day. You can choose the cause of death and role you appear as. If you're already had a target, you just switch to another.
- Stab whoever your target visits tonight, dealing a Basic attack. You do this by sneaking out of their shoe and materializing a knife. You can only do this while you're in a shoe.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will know who your target visits each night.
- One day after you hide in someone's shoe, they'll be notified that there's an annoying rock stuck in their shoe.
- While you're hiding in someone's shoe, you die if your host dies. However, you can't die otherwise. You're always considered visiting your target, but you will visit both your target *and* who they visit when you attack someone.
